response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to others, I am extending this exclusive offer to you. Given its significance and the benefits it could bring to you, I propose to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. I am confident that this price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also offers a reasonable profit margin for me. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring how we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
